Author: gibsonf1
Title: Google calls for more limits on Microsoft (Using Antitrust Legal Tactics - "A PR Stunt"?)

Author: awt
Content: I just don't see how getting users on facebook actually HURTS you.  I can see how it might not help you, but not how it hurts you.  ILike has apparently lost visitors to the main site...  I guess that makes sense if there is nothing more to do on the main site than in the F8 app.
